text: python will look for pydoc.py in the right directories without further ado.
pydoc is actually a Python script (so, on Windows, you need to look for pydoc.py), and it's not added to the Windows %PATH% by default (so you need to give a full pathname).
Try running c:\Python27\Lib\pydoc.py from your command line.
Edit: For a graphical interface to Python's documentation, you might want to instead run c:\Python27\Tools\Scripts\pydocgui.pyw (from the command line or from Windows Explorer).
This starts pydoc's web server on your local PC so you can access the documentation through your web browser.
